aws_ec2_transit_gateway_route.description: Manages an EC2 Transit Gateway Route

destination_cidr_block.description: IPv4 CIDR range used for destination matches. Routing decisions are based on the most specific match.

transit_gateway_attachment_id.description: Identifier of EC2 Transit Gateway Attachment (required if `blackhole` is set to false).

blackhole.description: Indicates whether to drop traffic that matches this route (default to `false`).

transit_gateway_route_table_id.description: Identifier of EC2 Transit Gateway Route Table.
